title: Emerald Radiance: Diamond-Adorned Temple Jhumkaalu
materials: 22K Yellow Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features Oval-cut Emeralds (Panna) and meticulously set Cubic Zirconia (CZ) diamonds.
features: Classic temple jewelry design with a modern twist. The jhumka boasts intricate filigree work adorned with sparkling CZ diamonds. The top showcases an oval emerald surrounded by a halo of CZ diamonds. The base features delicate golden bead hangings.
occasions: or a half-saree function (Langa Voni function). Also suitable for upscale evening events.
description: These Jhumkaalu are a perfect blend of tradition and contemporary elegance. The high-quality 22K gold ensures lasting value, while the Hyderabadi polish gives it a rich, antique-like appeal. The emeralds add a touch of royalty, and the CZ diamonds provide a dazzling sparkle without compromising the price point. They are lightweight and comfortable to wear, making them ideal for extended celebrations.
